snippet: The bill, introduced after a measles outbreak that originated at Disneyland, would require nearly all children to be vaccinated, eliminating the personal belief exemption that has contributed to the spread of preventable diseases.
abstract: Hundreds of California residents gather at State Capitol in Sacramento to protest bill that would eliminate right to abstain from vaccinating children against contagious diseases; gathering succeeds in stalling State Senate Education Committee vote on legislation by one week.
lead_paragraph: The bill, introduced after a measles outbreak that originated at Disneyland, would require nearly all children to be vaccinated, eliminating the personal belief exemption that has contributed to the spread of preventable diseases.

headline.main: California Parents Opposing State-Mandated Vaccinations of Children Delay Vote
headline.print_headline: California Parents Opposing State-Mandated Vaccinations of Children Delay Vote
